Oh my god, this game is fantastic!
Its one of the greatest story games ive ever played, the puzzles are fun, because when you fail many times and then finnaly complete one, you dont think "well that was stupid", you think "ooooh, thats clever"
I deffinetly recomend it.
AWESOME game. I don't know how else to put it.
This game is one of the all time greats, as well as the first one.
beautiful, chef's kiss. great jokes, challenging puzzles, etc. just buy it now, right now.

This game is incredibly fun and THE BEST puzzle game to get your mind going. I love that in this one, other than the first Portal game, you can play with friends, which makes it extremely fun. It's cheap too. It's definitely worth the money.
This game was made for a good cause.

This game wired my brain to see every white spot as a place to shoot a portal.

Portal 2, and the Portal series in general, is what I would say a must-play. Seriously. I'm no expert at puzzle games, but this series really found a middle ground between pretty challenging, and baby-mode easy. It's not too hard, but it'll get your brain turning those Aperture Science‚Ñ¢ gears in your head. Though I've only finished the mainline story, it really was an experience that I enjoyed all the way through.

The game has nice, challenging puzzle designs, smooth graphics and cinematic storyline. The caveat is, it is only enjoyable if you don't mind the first-person genre, the demand for rapid and accurate control on PC (beside a smooth-performant device), and some dark humor. I came from a different background (enjoying puzzles like Snakebird, PC only for work, etc), and this taste difference outweighs its positive sides for me.

If you are considering buying this, I'd suggest to stop looking at the review/like numbers on Steam, instead focusing on the review contents and insights to see if this game might be for you.

"Descreva o que gostou e o que n√£o gostou neste jogo"... A pergunta √©... O que eu n√£o gostei nesse jogo?! Portal √© uma masterclass em game designe, story telling e como usar games como arte interativa (diferente da maioria dos games artisticos de hj que buscam ser cinema). Se o primeiro ja era genial com algumas mecanicas e 2 personagens, o segundo √© tudo oq tinha q ser e mais! Novas mecanicas e itens para puzzles q fazem os puzzles do primeiro brincadeira de crian√ßa, e novos personagens q adicionam ainda mais a lore de portal e half-life com o roteiro genial do primeiro, mais o incrivel humor da serie que n deixa de surpreender (afinal uma conquista como piada foi... genial!). Sei la, n√£o gostei q acabou (o final √© genial tbm), queria mais kkkkkkkkkkk
Buen juego, el cooperativo es divertido y m√°s si juegas con amigos, la workshop es genial, dise√±ar niveles, uno de mis juegos favoritos y lo recomiendo al 100%
